trans-unit.source: To distribute your app with Electron, you need to download Electron's prebuilt binaries. Next, the folder containing your app should be named app and placed in Electron's resources directory as shown in the following examples. Note that the location of Electron's prebuilt binaries is indicated with electron/ in the examples below.
trans-unit.target: 要使用Electron分发您的应用程序，您需要下载Electron的预构建二进制文件。接下来，包含您应用程序的文件夹应命名为 app ,并放置在Electron的资源目录中，如以下示例所示。请注意，在下面的示例中，Electron的预构建二进制文件的位置用 electron/ 指示。

trans-unit.source: To do a source level single step in the currently selected thread, execute step (or s). This would take you into name_override_.empty(). To proceed and do a step over, run next (or n).

trans-unit.source: To embed a web page in your app, add the webview tag to your app's embedder page (this is the app page that will display the guest content). In its simplest form, the webview tag includes the src of the web page and css styles that control the appearance of the webview container:

trans-unit.source: To enable OS-enforced sandbox on BrowserWindow or webview process with sandbox:true without causing entire app to be in sandbox, --enable-mixed-sandbox command-line argument must be passed to electron. This option is currently only supported on macOS and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 sandbox:true 在 BrowserWindow 或 webview 进程上启用操作系统强制的沙箱，而又不使整个应用程序都处于沙箱中，必须将 --enable-mixed-sandbox 命令行参数传递给electronic。当前仅在macOS和Windows上支持此选项。

trans-unit.source: To enable this mode GPU acceleration has to be disabled by calling the app.disableHardwareAcceleration() API.
trans-unit.target: 要启用此模式，必须通过调用 app.disableHardwareAcceleration() API 来禁用GPU加速。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your C++ is in compliance with the Electron coding style, run npm run lint-cpp, which runs a cpplint script. We recommend that you use clang-format and prepared a short tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 为确保您的C ++符合Electron编码风格，请运行 npm run lint-cpp ，该脚本将运行 cpplint 脚本。我们建议您使用 clang-format 并准备一个简短的教程。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your JavaScript is in compliance with the Electron coding style, run npm run lint-js, which will run standard against both Electron itself as well as the unit tests. If you are using an editor with a plugin/addon system, you might want to use one of the many StandardJS addons to be informed of coding style violations before you ever commit them.
trans-unit.target: 为了确保您的JavaScript符合Electron编码风格，请运行 npm run lint-js ，它将针对Electron本身以及单元测试运行 standard 。如果您使用的是带有插件/附件系统的编辑器，则在提交它们之前，可能想使用许多StandardJS附件之一来了解编码风格违规。

trans-unit.source: To finish debugging at this point, run process continue. You can also continue until a certain line is hit in this thread (thread until 100). This command will run the thread in the current frame till it reaches line 100 in this frame or stops if it leaves the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 要在这一点上完成调试，请运行 process continue 。您也可以继续，直到在该线程中击中某行为 thread until 100 （线程直到100）。该命令将在当前帧中运行线程，直到线程到达该帧的第100行，或者如果线程离开当前帧则停止。

trans-unit.source: To generate the AppX package, the electron-windows-store CLI uses a template that should work for most Electron apps. However, if you are using a custom installer, or should you experience any trouble with the generated package, you can attempt to create a package using compilation with a Windows Container - in that mode, the CLI will install and run your application in blank Windows Container to determine what modifications your application is exactly doing to the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 为了生成AppX包， electron-windows-store CLI使用了适用于大多数Electron应用程序的模板。但是，如果您使用的是自定义安装程序，或者在生成的软件包中遇到任何麻烦，则可以尝试使用Windows容器使用编译来创建软件包-在这种模式下，CLI将在空白Windows中安装并运行您的应用程序确定您的应用程序对操作系统进行了哪些修改的容器。

trans-unit.source: To run all unit tests, run npm run test. The unit tests are an Electron app (surprise!) that can be found in the spec folder. Note that it has its own package.json and that its dependencies are therefore not defined in the top-level package.json.
trans-unit.target: 要运行所有单元测试，请运行 npm run test 。单元测试是一个电子应用程序（惊奇！），可以在 spec 文件夹中找到。请注意，它具有自己的 package.json ，因此其依赖项未在顶级 package.json 中定义。

trans-unit.source: To run only specific tests matching a pattern, run npm run test -- -g=PATTERN, replacing the PATTERN with a regex that matches the tests you would like to run. As an example: If you want to run only IPC tests, you would run npm run test -- -g ipc.
trans-unit.target: 要仅运行与模式匹配的特定测试，请运行 npm run test -- -g=PATTERN ，将 PATTERN 替换为与要运行的测试匹配的正则表达式。例如：如果只想运行IPC测试，则可以运行 npm run test -- -g ipc 。

trans-unit.source: To use this feature on Windows, your application has to be registered as a handler of the file type of the document, otherwise the file won't appear in JumpList even after you have added it. You can find everything on registering your application in Application Registration.

trans-unit.source: To write automated tests for your Electron app, you will need a way to "drive" your application. Spectron is a commonly-used solution which lets you emulate user actions via WebDriver. However, it's also possible to write your own custom driver using node's builtin IPC-over-STDIO. The benefit of a custom driver is that it tends to require less overhead than Spectron, and lets you expose custom methods to your test suite.
trans-unit.target: 要为您的Electron应用程序编写自动化测试，您将需要一种“驱动”应用程序的方法。Spectron是一种常用的解决方案，可让您通过WebDriver模拟用户操作。但是，也可以使用节点的内置IPC-over-STDIO编写自己的自定义驱动程序。自定义驱动程序的好处是，与Spectron相比，它所需的开销较小，并且可以将自定义方法公开给测试套件。

trans-unit.source: To write automated tests for your Electron app, you will need a way to "drive" your application. Spectron is a commonly-used solution which lets you emulate user actions via WebDriver. However, it's also possible to write your own custom driver using node's builtin IPC-over-STDIO. The benefit of a custom driver is that it tends to require less overhead than Spectron, and lets you expose custom methods to your test suite.
trans-unit.target: 要为您的Electron应用程序编写自动化测试，您将需要一种“驱动”应用程序的方法。Spectron是一种常用的解决方案，可让您通过WebDriver模拟用户操作。但是，也可以使用节点的内置IPC-over-STDIO编写自己的自定义驱动程序。自定义驱动程序的好处是，与Spectron相比，它需要的开销更少，并且可以将自定义方法公开给测试套件。

trans-unit.source: Together with the broader Linux community, Canonical aims to fix many of the common software installation problems with the snapcraft project. Snaps are containerized software packages that include required dependencies, auto-update, and work on all major Linux distributions without system modification.
trans-unit.target: Canonical与更广泛的Linux社区一起，致力于解决 snapcraft 项目中的许多常见软件安装问题。快照是容器化的软件包，其中包括必需的依赖项，自动更新以及可以在所有主要Linux发行版上运行而无需进行系统修改。

trans-unit.source: Try not to be discouraged. If you feel that a review is unfair, say so or seek the input of another project contributor. Often such comments are the result of a reviewer having taken insufficient time to review and are not ill-intended. Such difficulties can often be resolved with a bit of patience. That said, reviewers should be expected to provide helpful feeback.
trans-unit.target: 尽量不要气馁。如果你觉得某项审查不公平,可以说出来,或者寻求其他项目贡献者的意见。通常这种意见是由于审稿人没有花足够的时间来审稿,并不是恶意的。这种困难往往可以通过一点耐心来解决。尽管如此,应该期望审查者提供有益的回击。

trans-unit.source: Turning this Node application into an Electron application is quite simple - we merely replace the node runtime with the electron runtime.
trans-unit.target: 将此Node应用程序转换为Electron应用程序非常简单-我们仅将 node runtime替换为 electron ic runtime。

trans-unit.source: Two modes of rendering can be used and only the dirty area is passed in the 'paint' event to be more efficient. The rendering can be stopped, continued and the frame rate can be set. The specified frame rate is a top limit value, when there is nothing happening on a webpage, no frames are generated. The maximum frame rate is 60, because above that there is no benefit, only performance loss.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用两种渲染模式，只有在 'paint' 事件中传递脏区才能提高效率。渲染可以停止，继续并可以设置帧频。指定的帧速率是一个最高限值，当网页上没有任何内容时，则不会生成任何帧。最大帧速率为60，因为在此之上没有好处，只有性能损失。

trans-unit.target: 与Squirrel.Mac不同，Windows可以在S3或任何其他静态文件主机上托管更新。您可以阅读Squirrel.Windows的文档以获取有关Squirrel.Windows如何工作的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Unlike an iframe, the webview runs in a separate process than your app. It doesn't have the same permissions as your web page and all interactions between your app and embedded content will be asynchronous. This keeps your app safe from the embedded content. Note: Most methods called on the webview from the host page require a synchronous call to the main process.
trans-unit.target: 与 iframe 不同， webview 运行过程与应用程序不同。它没有与您的网页相同的权限，并且您的应用程序与嵌入式内容之间的所有交互都是异步的。这样可以确保您的应用不受嵌入内容的影响。注意：从宿主页面在Web视图上调用的大多数方法都需要同步调用主进程。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most projects that use Release and Debug as target names, Electron uses R and D instead. This is because gyp randomly crashes if there is only one Release or Debug build configuration defined, and Electron only has to generate one target at a time as stated above.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数使用 Release 和 Debug 作为目标名称的项目不同，Electron 改为使用 R 和 D 。这是因为，如果仅定义了一个 Release 或 Debug 构建配置， gyp 就会随机崩溃，并且如上所述，Electron一次只能生成一个目标。

Upgrading Node is much easier than upgrading libchromiumcontent, so fewer conflicts arise if one upgrades libchromiumcontent first, then chooses the upstream Node release whose V8 is closest to it.

trans-unit.source: Usually this is not a problem for desktop applications since the code is always trusted, but it makes Electron less secure than Chromium for displaying untrusted web content. For applications that require more security, the sandbox flag will force Electron to spawn a classic Chromium renderer that is compatible with the sandbox.
trans-unit.target: 通常对于桌面应用程序来说这不是问题，因为该代码始终是受信任的，但它使Electron的安全性不如Chromium来显示不受信任的Web内容。对于需要更高安全性的应用程序， sandbox 标志将强制Electron生成与沙箱兼容的经典Chromium渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Usually this is not a problem for desktop applications since the code is always trusted, but it makes electron less secure than chromium for displaying untrusted web content. For applications that require more security, the sandbox flag will force electron to spawn a classic chromium renderer that is compatible with the sandbox.
trans-unit.target: 通常对于桌面应用程序来说这不是问题，因为该代码始终是可信任的，但是它使电子不如铬安全地显示不可信的Web内容。对于需要更高安全性的应用程序， sandbox 标志将强制电子生成与沙箱兼容的经典铬渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Usually those modules work fine under Electron, but sometimes when Electron uses a newer version of V8 than Node and/or there are ABI changes, bad things may happen. So in general, it is recommended to always build native modules from source code. electron-rebuild handles this for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这些模块在Electron下可以正常工作，但是有时，当Electron使用比Node更新的V8版本和/或进行ABI更改时，可能会发生不良情况。因此，通常建议始终从源代码构建本机模块。 electron-rebuild 会自动为您处理。

trans-unit.source: Usually those modules work fine under Electron, but sometimes when Electron uses a newer version of V8 than Node, and there are ABI changes, bad things may happen. So in general it is recommended to always build native modules from source code.

trans-unit.source: We aim to keep the code coverage of Electron high. We ask that all pull request not only pass all existing tests, but ideally also add new tests to cover changed code and new scenarios. Ensuring that we capture as many code paths and use cases of Electron as possible ensures that we all ship apps with fewer bugs.
trans-unit.target: 我们的目标是保持Electron的高代码覆盖率。我们要求所有的拉取请求不仅要通过所有现有的测试,最好还能添加新的测试来覆盖变化的代码和新的场景。确保我们尽可能多地捕获Electron的代码路径和用例,以确保我们在发布应用时减少错误。

trans-unit.source: We allow for multiple stabilization branches to exist simultaneously, and intend to support at least two in parallel at all times, backporting security fixes as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 我们允许多个稳定分支同时存在,并打算一直支持至少两个分支并行,必要时回传安全修复。

trans-unit.source: We allow squashing of commits, provided that the squashed message adheres the the above message format.
trans-unit.target: 我们允许压制提交,但前提是压制的信息必须符合上述信息格式。

trans-unit.source: We allow squashing of commits, provided that the squashed message adheres to the above message format.
trans-unit.target: 我们允许压制提交,只要压制的消息符合上述消息格式。

trans-unit.source: We can now communicate from the test suite to the Electron app using the appProcess object.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以使用 appProcess 对象从测试套件与Electron应用程序进行通信。

trans-unit.source: We can't push security updates to users directly, so we rely on app vendors to upgrade the version of Electron underlying their app in order for security updates to reach users.
trans-unit.target: 我们无法直接向用户推送安全更新,所以我们依靠应用厂商升级其应用底层的Electron版本,以使安全更新能够到达用户手中。

trans-unit.source: We do not have the dedicated resources or expertise that Chromium has to apply to the security of its product. We do our best to make use of what we have, to inherit everything we can from Chromium, and to respond quickly to security issues, but Electron cannot be as secure as Chromium without the resources that Chromium is able to dedicate.
trans-unit.target: 我们没有Chromium所拥有的专门资源和专业技术来应用于产品的安全。我们尽最大努力利用我们所拥有的资源,继承Chromium的一切,并对安全问题做出快速反应,但如果没有Chromium所能奉献的资源,Electron不可能像Chromium那样安全。

trans-unit.source: We don’t track upstream closely due to logistics:
trans-unit.target: 由于物流问题，我们没有密切跟踪上游：

trans-unit.source: We don’t want those patches because we’re only patching V8.
trans-unit.target: 我们不想要这些补丁，因为我们只是在修补V8。

trans-unit.source: We don't want to commit the changes (they're kept in the patchfiles) but need them locally so that they don't show up in subsequent diffs while we iterate through more patches
trans-unit.target: 我们不想提交这些改动(它们保存在补丁文件中),但需要将它们保存在本地,以便在我们迭代更多补丁时,它们不会出现在后续的差异中。

trans-unit.source: We feel that our current system of updating the Chromium component strikes an appropriate balance between the resources we have available and the needs of the majority of applications built on top of the framework. We definitely are interested in hearing more about specific use cases from the people that build things on top of Electron. Pull requests and contributions supporting this effort are always very welcome.
trans-unit.target: 我们认为,我们目前的Chromium组件更新系统在我们现有的资源和大多数建立在框架之上的应用程序的需求之间取得了适当的平衡。我们绝对有兴趣听到更多关于在Electron之上构建应用程序的人的具体使用案例。我们非常欢迎支持这项工作的Pull请求和贡献。

trans-unit.source: We might suggest two free popular editors built in Electron: GitHub's Atom and Microsoft's Visual Studio Code. Both of them have excellent JavaScript support.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能建议使用Electron内置的两个免费流行编辑器：GitHub的Atom和Microsoft的Visual Studio Code。它们都具有出色的JavaScript支持。

trans-unit.target: 我们建议您将Node的解析器用于URL。有时可能会愚弄简单的字符串比较 startsWith('https://example.com') 测试会让 https://example.com.attacker.com 通过。

trans-unit.target: 我们将详细介绍git分支是如何工作的,npm标签是如何工作的,开发者应该期待看到什么,以及如何可以回传更改。

trans-unit.source: WebDriver is an open source tool for automated testing of web apps across many browsers. It provides capabilities for navigating to web pages, user input, JavaScript execution, and more. ChromeDriver is a standalone server which implements WebDriver's wire protocol for Chromium. It is being developed by members of the Chromium and WebDriver teams.
trans-unit.target: WebDriver是一个开源工具,用于在多种浏览器上自动测试Web应用程序。它提供了网页导航、用户输入、JavaScript执行等功能。ChromeDriver是一个独立的服务器,它为Chromium实现了WebDriver的线协议。它是由Chromium和WebDriver团队的成员开发的。

trans-unit.source: WebViews: Verify the options and params of all <webview> tags
trans-unit.target: WebViews：验证所有 <webview> 标记的选项和参数

trans-unit.target: 如果DevTools扩展不能工作,我应该怎么办?

trans-unit.source: What’s important about the second point is that apps using ^ should still be able to expect a reasonable level of stability. To accomplish this, semver allows for a pre-release identifier to indicate a particular version is not yet safe or stable.
trans-unit.target: 关于第二点重要的是，使用 ^ 的应用程序仍应能够预期合理的稳定性。为了实现此目的，semver允许使用预发布标识符来指示特定版本尚不安全或稳定。

trans-unit.source: Whatever you choose, you will periodically have to bump the version in your package.json as breaking changes are a fact of Chromium life.
trans-unit.target: 无论选择什么，您都必须定期更改 package.json 中的版本，因为重大更改是Chromium生命的事实。

trans-unit.source: When app.relaunch is called for multiple times, multiple instances will be started after current instance exited.
trans-unit.target: 当 app.relaunch 被称为多次后，当前实例退出多个实例将启动。

trans-unit.source: When callback is called with nothing, a number, or an object that has an error property, the request will fail with the error number you specified. For the available error numbers you can use, please see the net error list.
trans-unit.target: 如果不带任何 callback ，数字或具有 error 属性的对象调用回调，则 request 将失败，并 error 您指定的错误号。有关可以使用的可用错误编号，请参见网络错误列表。

trans-unit.source: When contents is a <webview> tag, the mode would be detach by default, explicitly passing an empty mode can force using last used dock state.
trans-unit.target: 当 contents 为 <webview> 标记时，默认情况 mode 将 detach 模式，显式传递空 mode 会强制使用上次使用的停靠状态。

trans-unit.source: When critical is passed, the dock icon will bounce until either the application becomes active or the request is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 当 critical 点通过时，停靠图标将弹起，直到应用程序变为活动状态或请求被取消为止。

trans-unit.source: When informational is passed, the dock icon will bounce for one second. However, the request remains active until either the application becomes active or the request is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 当 informational 通过时，Dock图标会反弹一秒钟。但是，该请求将保持活动状态，直到应用程序变为活动状态或请求被取消为止。

trans-unit.source: When pacScript and proxyRules are provided together, the proxyRules option is ignored and pacScript configuration is applied.
trans-unit.target: 当 pacScript 和 proxyRules 设置在一起时， proxyRules 选项将被忽略和 pacScript 配置被应用。

trans-unit.source: When window.open is called to create a new window in a web page, a new instance of BrowserWindow will be created for the url and a proxy will be returned to window.open to let the page have limited control over it.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 window.open 在网页中创建一个新窗口时，将为该 url 创建一个新的 BrowserWindow 实例，并将代理返回给 window.open 以使该页面对其具有有限的控制权。

trans-unit.source: When Electron reads from an ASAR file, log the read offset and file path to the system tmpdir. The resulting file can be provided to the ASAR module to optimize file ordering.
trans-unit.target: 当Electron从ASAR文件读取时，将读取的偏移量和文件路径记录到系统 tmpdir 中。可以将结果文件提供给ASAR模块以优化文件排序。

trans-unit.source: When a Debug build of Electron succeeds, run the tests: $ ./script/test.py Fix the failing tests.
trans-unit.target: 当Electron的Debug构建成功时，运行测试： $ ./script/test.py 修复失败的测试。

trans-unit.source: When a custom pageSize is passed, Chromium attempts to validate platform specific minimum values for width_microns and height_microns. Width and height must both be minimum 353 microns but may be higher on some operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 传递自定义的 pageSize 时，Chromium会尝试验证 width_microns 和 height_microns 的特定于平台的最小值。宽度和高度都必须最小为353微米，但在某些操作系统上可能更高。

trans-unit.source: When a file is requested from the recent documents menu, the open-file event of app module will be emitted for it.
trans-unit.target: 当从“最近文档”菜单中请求文件时，将为其发出 app 模块的 open-file 事件。

trans-unit.source: When a given accelerator is already taken by other applications, this call will silently fail. This behavior is intended by operating systems, since they don't want applications to fight for global shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 当一个给定的加速器已经被其他应用程序占用时,这个调用将默默地失败。这种行为是操作系统所希望的,因为它们不希望应用程序为全局捷径而争夺。

trans-unit.source: When a new version of Node.js gets released, we usually wait for about a month before upgrading the one in Electron. So we can avoid getting affected by bugs introduced in new Node.js versions, which happens very often.
trans-unit.target: 当Node.js的新版本发布时,我们通常会等待一个月左右再升级Electron中的版本。这样我们可以避免受到新的Node.js版本中引入的bug的影响,这种情况经常发生。

trans-unit.source: When a new version of Node.js is released, Electron usually waits about a month before upgrading in order to bring in a more stable version.
trans-unit.target: 当Node.js的新版本发布时,Electron通常会等待一个月左右再进行升级,以便带来更稳定的版本。

trans-unit.source: When a release branch reaches the end of its support cycle, the series will be deprecated in NPM and a final end-of-support release will be made. This release will add a warning to inform that an unsupported version of Electron is in use.
trans-unit.target: 当一个发布分支的支持周期结束时,该系列将在NPM中被废止,并进行最后的支持结束发布。这个版本将增加一个警告,告知正在使用一个不支持的Electron版本。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a file from the JumpList, a new instance of your application will be started with the path of the file added as a command line argument.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击JumpList中的文件时,一个新的应用程序实例将被启动,文件的路径将被添加为命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: When an API is changed or removed in a way that breaks existing functionality, the previous functionality will be supported for a minimum of two major versions when possible before being removed. For example, if a function takes three arguments, and that number is reduced to two in major version 10, the three-argument version would continue to work until, at minimum, major version 12. Past the minimum two-version threshold, we will attempt to support backwards compatibility beyond two versions until the maintainers feel the maintenance burden is too high to continue doing so.
trans-unit.target: 当一个API被更改或删除,从而破坏了现有的功能时,之前的功能将在可能的情况下至少支持两个主要版本,然后才会被删除。例如,如果一个函数需要三个参数,而在主要版本10中减少到两个,那么三个参数的版本将继续工作,至少到主要版本12。过了最低限度的两个版本门槛,我们将尝试支持两个版本以上的向后兼容性,直到维护者觉得维护负担太大,无法继续这样做。

trans-unit.source: When an item is positioned, all un-positioned items are inserted after it until a new item is positioned. So if you want to position a group of menu items in the same location you only need to specify a position for the first item.
trans-unit.target: 当一个项目被定位后,所有未定位的项目都会被插入到它之后,直到一个新的项目被定位。因此,如果你想将一组菜单项定位在同一位置,你只需要为第一个项指定一个位置。

trans-unit.source: When disabling Node.js integration, you can still expose APIs to your website that do consume Node.js modules or features. Preload scripts continue to have access to require and other Node.js features, allowing developers to expose a custom API to remotely loaded content.

trans-unit.target: 当加速器已被其他应用程序采用时，此调用仍将返回 false 。此行为是操作系统所想要的，因为它们不希望应用程序为全局快捷方式而战。

trans-unit.source: When the build succeeds, create a dist for Electron
trans-unit.target: 构建成功后，为Electron 创建一个 dist

trans-unit.source: When the guest page doesn't have node integration this script will still have access to all Node APIs, but global objects injected by Node will be deleted after this script has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 当客人页面没有集成node时,这个脚本仍然可以访问所有的Node API,但Node注入的全局对象会在这个脚本执行完毕后被删除。

trans-unit.source: When the module is a set of APIs, like globalShortcut, use camelCase.
trans-unit.target: 当模块是一组API（例如 globalShortcut )时，请使用 camelCase 。

trans-unit.source: When the module itself is a class like BrowserWindow, use PascalCase.
trans-unit.target: 当模块本身是类似 BrowserWindow 的类时，请使用 PascalCase 。

trans-unit.source: When this API is called, the before-quit event is not emitted before all windows are closed. As a result you should listen to this event if you wish to perform actions before the windows are closed while a process is quitting, as well as listening to before-quit.
trans-unit.target: 调用此API时，在关闭所有窗口之前不会发出before before-quit 事件。因此，如果您希望在进程退出时关闭窗口之前执行操作，则应该侦听此事件，以及侦听 before-quit 。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the webview container will automatically resize within the bounds specified by the attributes minwidth, minheight, maxwidth, and maxheight. These constraints do not impact the webview unless autosize is enabled. When autosize is enabled, the webview container size cannot be less than the minimum values or greater than the maximum.
trans-unit.target: 出现此属性后， webview 容器将自动在属性 minwidth ， minheight ， maxwidth 和 maxheight 指定的范围内调整大小。除非启用了 autosize 否则这些限制不会影响 webview 。当 autosize 被启用，则 webview 容器大小不能小于最小值或大于最大值。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the webview contents will be prevented from resizing when the webview element itself is resized.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性存在时，将在调整 webview 元素本身的大小时阻止 webview 内容的大小调整。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the guest page in webview will be able to use browser plugins. Plugins are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 出现此属性后， webview 中的访客页面将能够使用浏览器插件。默认情况下禁用插件。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the guest page in webview will have node integration and can use node APIs like require and process to access low level system resources. Node integration is disabled by default in the guest page.
trans-unit.target: 出现此属性后， webview 中的访客页面将具有节点集成功能，并且可以使用诸如 require 和 process 之类的节点API 来访问低级系统资源。来宾页面默认情况下禁用节点集成。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the guest page will be allowed to open new windows. Popups are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性存在时,客人页面将被允许打开新窗口。默认情况下,弹出窗口被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When this attribute is present the guest page will have web security disabled. Web security is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 当这个属性存在时,访客页面将被禁用网络安全。默认情况下,网络安全是启用的。

trans-unit.source: When using electron-winstaller or electron-forge make sure you do not try to update your app the first time it runs (Also see this issue for more info). It's also recommended to use electron-squirrel-startup to get desktop shortcuts for your app.
trans-unit.target: 使用electron-winstaller或electron-forge时，请确保不要在首次运行时尝试对其进行更新（有关更多信息，请参见此问题）。还建议使用电子松鼠启动来获取应用程序的桌面快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: When working with Electron, it is important to understand that Electron is not a web browser. It allows you to build feature-rich desktop applications with familiar web technologies, but your code wields much greater power. JavaScript can access the filesystem, user shell, and more. This allows you to build high quality native applications, but the inherent security risks scale with the additional powers granted to your code.
trans-unit.target: 在使用Electron时,重要的是要明白Electron不是一个网络浏览器。它允许你使用熟悉的网络技术来构建功能丰富的桌面应用程序,但你的代码却拥有更强大的功能。JavaScript可以访问文件系统、用户外壳等。这让您可以构建高质量的本地应用程序,但固有的安全风险会随着您的代码被赋予的额外权力而扩大。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you make changes to Electron source code, you'll need to re-run the build before the tests:
trans-unit.target: 每当你对Electron源代码进行修改时,你都需要在测试前重新运行构建。

trans-unit.source: Whenever your Electron application is not behaving the way you wanted it to, an array of debugging tools might help you find coding errors, performance bottlenecks, or optimization opportunities.
trans-unit.target: 当你的Electron应用程序没有按照你想要的方式运行时,一系列的调试工具可能会帮助你找到编码错误、性能瓶颈或优化机会。

trans-unit.source: Whether the prebuilt binary can run on a distribution depends on whether the distribution includes the libraries that Electron is linked to on the building platform, so only Ubuntu 18.04 is guaranteed to work, but following platforms are also verified to be able to run the prebuilt binaries of Electron:

trans-unit.source: While Electron strives to support new versions of Chromium as soon as possible, developers should be aware that upgrading is a serious undertaking - involving hand-editing dozens or even hundreds of files. Given the resources and contributions available today, Electron will often not be on the very latest version of Chromium, lagging behind by either days or weeks.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Electron努力尽快支持新版本的Chromium,但开发者应该意识到,升级是一项严肃的工作--需要手工编辑几十个甚至几百个文件。考虑到现在的资源和贡献,Electron经常不会使用最新的Chromium版本,不是滞后几天就是几周。

trans-unit.source: While Visual Studio is fantastic for inspecting specific code paths, ProcMon's strength is really in observing everything your application is doing with the operating system - it captures File, Registry, Network, Process, and Profiling details of processes. It attempts to log all events occurring and can be quite overwhelming, but if you seek to understand what and how your application is doing to the operating system, it can be a valuable resource.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Visual Studio非常适合检查特定的代码路径，但ProcMon的优势实际上在于观察您的应用程序在操作系统上所做的一切-它捕获文件，注册表，网络，进程和进程的详细信息。它会尝试记录所有发生的事件，并且可能会让人不知所措，但是如果您想了解应用程序对操作系统的作用和方式，那么它可能是宝贵的资源。

trans-unit.source: While code and user experience across operating systems are similar, there are subtle differences.
trans-unit.target: 虽然不同操作系统的代码和用户体验相似,但也有细微的差别。

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to install snapcraft on macOS using Homebrew, it is not able to build snap packages and is focused on managing packages in the store.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以使用Homebrew在macOS 上安装 snapcraft ，但它无法构建 snap 软件包，并且专注于管理商店中的软件包。

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to distribute unsigned apps, it is not recommended. Both Windows and macOS will, by default, prevent either the download or the execution of unsigned applications. Starting with macOS Catalina (version 10.15), users have to go through multiple manual steps to open unsigned applications.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以发布未签名的应用程序,但不建议这样做。Windows和macOS默认都会阻止下载或执行未签名的应用程序。从macOS Catalina(10.15版本)开始,用户必须经过多个手动步骤才能打开未签名的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: While notifications including buttons work with electron-windows-notifications, handling replies requires the use of electron-windows-interactive-notifications, which helps with registering the required COM components and calling your Electron app with the entered user data.
trans-unit.target: 虽然包括按钮的通知可用于 electron-windows-notifications ，但要处理答复，则需要使用 electron-windows-interactive-notifications ，这有助于注册所需的COM组件并使用输入的用户数据调用您的Electron应用程序。

trans-unit.source: While still an experimental Electron feature, context isolation adds an additional layer of security. It creates a new JavaScript world for Electron APIs and preload scripts.
trans-unit.target: 虽然仍然是一个实验性的Electron功能,但上下文隔离增加了一个额外的安全层。它为Electron API和预加载脚本创造了一个新的JavaScript世界。

trans-unit.source: While we make our best effort to backport Chromium security fixes to older versions of Electron, we do not make a guarantee that every fix will be backported. Your best chance at staying secure is to be on the latest stable version of Electron.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我们会尽最大努力将Chromium的安全补丁移植到旧版本的Electron上,但我们并不保证每一个补丁都会被移植。您最好的选择是使用最新的稳定版本的Electron。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 "Anniversary Update" is able to run win32 .exe binaries by launching them together with a virtualized filesystem and registry. Both are created during compilation by running app and installer inside a Windows Container, allowing Windows to identify exactly which modifications to the operating system are done during installation. Pairing the executable with a virtual filesystem and a virtual registry allows Windows to enable one-click installation and uninstallation.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10“周年更新”能够通过与虚拟文件系统和注册表一起启动win32 .exe 二进制文件来运行它们。两者都是在编译过程中通过在Windows容器中运行应用程序和安装程序创建的，从而使Windows能够准确识别在安装过程中对操作系统进行了哪些修改。将可执行文件与虚拟文件系统和虚拟注册表配对，可使Windows启用一键式安装和卸载。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 has a global setting controlling microphone and camera access for all win32 applications. It will always return granted for screen and for all media types on older versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10具有全局设置，可控制所有win32应用程序的 microphone 和 camera 访问。对于旧版本的Windows ，将始终为 screen 和所有媒体类型返回已 granted 。
Windows 10与周年庆更新(2016年8月2日发布)。

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 and later are supported, older operating systems are not supported (and do not work).
trans-unit.target: 支持Windows7及以后的操作系统,不支持旧的操作系统(也不能用)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Security doesn't like one of the files in the Chromium source code (see https://crbug.com/441184), so it will constantly delete it, causing gclient sync issues. You can exclude the source tree from being monitored by Windows Security by following these instructions.
trans-unit.target: Windows安全性不喜欢Chromium源代码中的文件之一（请参阅https://crbug.com/441184），因此它将不断删除它，从而导致 gclient sync 问题。您可以按照以下说明将源树排除在Windows安全保护之外。

trans-unit.source: With Windows 10, the good old win32 executable got a new sibling: The Universal Windows Platform. The new .appx format does not only enable a number of new powerful APIs like Cortana or Push Notifications, but through the Windows Store, also simplifies installation and updating.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 10中，良好的旧win32可执行文件有了新的同级文件：Universal Windows Platform。新的 .appx 格式不仅启用了许多新的强大API（例如Cortana或Push Notifications），而且还通过Windows应用商店简化了安装和更新。

trans-unit.source: With special patches in Electron, Node APIs like fs.readFile and require treat asar archives as virtual directories, and the files in it as normal files in the filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 有了Electron中的特殊补丁，Node API就像 fs.readFile 一样， require 将 asar 存档视为虚拟目录，并将其中的文件视为文件系统中的普通文件。

trans-unit.source: With that in mind, be aware that displaying arbitrary content from untrusted sources poses a severe security risk that Electron is not intended to handle. In fact, the most popular Electron apps (Atom, Slack, Visual Studio Code, etc) display primarily local content (or trusted, secure remote content without Node integration) – if your application executes code from an online source, it is your responsibility to ensure that the code is not malicious.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到这一点，请注意，显示来自不受信任来源的任意内容会带来严重的安全风险，Electron不会处理这些风险。实际上，最流行的Electron应用程序（Atom，Slack，Visual Studio Code等）主要显示本地内容（或没有Node集成的受信任的安全远程内容）–如果您的应用程序从在线源执行代码，则您有责任确保代码不是恶意的。

trans-unit.source: You can now set breakpoints in any of the indexed files. However, you will not be able to set breakpoints directly in the Chromium source. To set break points in the Chromium source, you can choose Debug > Breakpoints > Create Symbolic Breakpoint and set any function name as the symbol. This will set the breakpoint for all functions with that name, from all the classes if there are more than one. You can also do this step of setting break points prior to attaching the debugger, however, actual breakpoints for symbolic breakpoint functions may not show up until the debugger is attached to the app.

trans-unit.source: You can now set breakpoints in any of the indexed files. However, you will not be able to set breakpoints directly in the chromium source. You can also do this step of setting break points prior to attaching the debugger, however, actual breakpoints for symbolic breakpoint functions may not show up until the debugger is attached to the app.
